languages.text: {n}Доспех жуткого отродья покрыт нечестивыми ремонтными письменами, сделанными кровью. В нескольких местах видны свежие керамитовые заплатки — следы недавних тяжких ран, полученных в боях на поверхности. Но монстр выглядит сполна восстановившим свои силы, и плоть его безобразно вздувается от переполняющей ее силы варпа.{/n}

{n}The abomination's armour wetly gleams with profane repair scripts daubed in blood. It has been patched with fresh ceramite in several places, evidence of serious damage received in recent battles on the surface, but the monster appears to have fully regained its strength. Its flesh swells hideously as it is flooded with the power of the warp.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Доспех жуткого отродья покрыт нечестивыми ремонтными письменами, сделанными кровью. В нескольких местах видны свежие керамитовые заплатки — следы недавних тяжких ран, полученных в боях на поверхности. Но монстр выглядит сполна восстановившим свои силы, и плоть его безобразно вздувается от переполняющей ее силы варпа.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这只地狱兽的盔甲散发着液体的光泽，上面用鲜血写满了亵渎性的文字。它的盔甲上有很多处陶钢修补过的痕迹，很显然，不久之前地面上的战斗，让它的躯体受到了严重损伤。但如今，这头怪物似乎已经完全恢复了力量。在亚空间的影响下，它的躯体膨胀着，显得格外狰狞。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination's armour wetly gleams with profane repair scripts daubed in blood. It has been patched with fresh ceramite in several places, evidence of serious damage received in recent battles on the surface, but the monster appears to have fully regained its strength. Its flesh swells hideously as it is flooded with the power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只地狱兽的盔甲散发着液体的光泽，上面用鲜血写满了亵渎性的文字。它的盔甲上有很多处陶钢修补过的痕迹，很显然，不久之前地面上的战斗，让它的躯体受到了严重损伤。但如今，这头怪物似乎已经完全恢复了力量。在亚空间的影响下，它的躯体膨胀着，显得格外狰狞。{/n}
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}忌まわしい敵のアーマーは、血文字の不敬な修復構文が塗りたくられ、濡れ光っている。新品のセラマイトで数カ所がつぎはぎされているのは、先の地表での戦闘でひどい損傷を受けた証だ。しかし、怪物はすっかり元の強さを取り戻したように見える。肉体は歪みの力がほとばしっているかのように、ぞっとするほど膨れ上がっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination's armour wetly gleams with profane repair scripts daubed in blood. It has been patched with fresh ceramite in several places, evidence of serious damage received in recent battles on the surface, but the monster appears to have fully regained its strength. Its flesh swells hideously as it is flooded with the power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}忌まわしい敵のアーマーは、血文字の不敬な修復構文が塗りたくられ、濡れ光っている。新品のセラマイトで数カ所がつぎはぎされているのは、先の地表での戦闘でひどい損傷を受けた証だ。しかし、怪物はすっかり元の強さを取り戻したように見える。肉体は歪みの力がほとばしっているかのように、ぞっとするほど膨れ上がっている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}La armadura de la abominación presenta inscripciones de reparación ensangrentadas que la dotan de un brillo húmedo. Ciertas partes se encuentran remendadas con ceramita fresca, prueba de los considerables daños que recibió en sus recientes batallas en la superficie, pero el monstruo parece haber recobrado por completo sus fuerzas. Su carne se hincha grotescamente al imbuirse del poder de la disformidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination's armour wetly gleams with profane repair scripts daubed in blood. It has been patched with fresh ceramite in several places, evidence of serious damage received in recent battles on the surface, but the monster appears to have fully regained its strength. Its flesh swells hideously as it is flooded with the power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La armadura de la abominación presenta inscripciones de reparación ensangrentadas que la dotan de un brillo húmedo. Ciertas partes se encuentran remendadas con ceramita fresca, prueba de los considerables daños que recibió en sus recientes batallas en la superficie, pero el monstruo parece haber recobrado por completo sus fuerzas. Su carne se hincha grotescamente al imbuirse del poder de la disformidad.{/n}
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}L'armure de l'abomination luit de l'éclat humide des éclaboussures de sang qui recouvrent ses inscriptions réparatrices profanes. Elle a été rapiécée à l'aide de céramite en plusieurs endroits, preuve des dégâts subis lors de récentes batailles à la surface, mais le monstre semble avoir recouvré toutes ses forces. Sa chair gonfle hideusement sous l'effet du pouvoir du Warp qui déferle en lui.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination's armour wetly gleams with profane repair scripts daubed in blood. It has been patched with fresh ceramite in several places, evidence of serious damage received in recent battles on the surface, but the monster appears to have fully regained its strength. Its flesh swells hideously as it is flooded with the power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'armure de l'abomination luit de l'éclat humide des éclaboussures de sang qui recouvrent ses inscriptions réparatrices profanes. Elle a été rapiécée à l'aide de céramite en plusieurs endroits, preuve des dégâts subis lors de récentes batailles à la surface, mais le monstre semble avoir recouvré toutes ses forces. Sa chair gonfle hideusement sous l'effet du pouvoir du Warp qui déferle en lui.{/n}
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}Die Panzerung der Abscheulichkeit glänzt feucht mit in Blut getauchten, unheiligen Reparaturschriften. Sie wurde an mehreren Stellen mit frischem Ceramit geflickt, was auf ernsthafte Beschädigungen bei kürzlich bestrittenen Schlachten an der Oberfläche schließen lässt, aber das Monster scheint seine volle Stärke zurückerhalten zu haben. Sein Fleisch schwillt scheußlich an, denn es wird von der Kraft des Warp durchströmt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination's armour wetly gleams with profane repair scripts daubed in blood. It has been patched with fresh ceramite in several places, evidence of serious damage received in recent battles on the surface, but the monster appears to have fully regained its strength. Its flesh swells hideously as it is flooded with the power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Panzerung der Abscheulichkeit glänzt feucht mit in Blut getauchten, unheiligen Reparaturschriften. Sie wurde an mehreren Stellen mit frischem Ceramit geflickt, was auf ernsthafte Beschädigungen bei kürzlich bestrittenen Schlachten an der Oberfläche schließen lässt, aber das Monster scheint seine volle Stärke zurückerhalten zu haben. Sein Fleisch schwillt scheußlich an, denn es wird von der Kraft des Warp durchströmt.{/n}
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest

languages.text: {n}Garabetin zırhı; kana bulanmış, kâfirce tamirat yazılarıyla ıslak ıslak parıldıyor. Birkaç yeri taze seramitle yamalanmış, yüzeyinde yakın zamanda aldığı ciddi hasarın izleri mevcut. Canavar ise gücünü tamamen geri kazanmış gibi gözüküyor. Öteboyut enerjisiyle doldukça eti, iğrenç bir şekilde şişiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The abomination's armour wetly gleams with profane repair scripts daubed in blood. It has been patched with fresh ceramite in several places, evidence of serious damage received in recent battles on the surface, but the monster appears to have fully regained its strength. Its flesh swells hideously as it is flooded with the power of the warp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Garabetin zırhı, kana bulanmış kâfir tamirat yazılarıyla ıslak ıslak parıldıyor. Birkaç yeri taze seramitle yamalanmış, yüzeyinde yakın zamanda aldığı ciddi hasarın kanıtları mevcut ama canavar gücünü tamamen geri kazanmış gibi gözüküyor. Öteboyut enerjisiyle doldukça eti iğrenç bir şekilde şişiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HellBrute_UlfarQuest
